name: APPLE iPhone 14
description: Experience smooth operation and brilliant user interface with the 5G-ready Google Pixel 7 Pro smartphone that comes loaded with breathtaking features. Google Tensor G2 makes Pixel 7 faster, more efficient, and more secure and it delivers even more helpful features. Furthermore, the Pixel 7 Pro triple rear camera system includes a 5x telephoto lens. The upgraded ultrawide lens with autofocus now powers Macro Focus. Also, the Pixel 7 Pro has a 30x Super Res Zoom for high-quality photos from far away. Moreover, the Pixel 7 Pro's 17.018 cm (6.7) Smooth Display makes everything stunning and immersive. It intelligently adjusts up to 120 Hz for smoother, more responsive performance.
